functional_units.name: Bookmark Persistence Store
functional_units.description: Provides a versioned JSON format for storing and resolving security-scoped bookmark identifiers used by recents and session snapshots.

functional_units.name: Recents Session Snapshot Integration
functional_units.description: Extends DocumentRecent and WorkspaceSessionFileSnapshot to include bookmark identifiers, enabling persistence of recent files and workspace sessions via the BookmarkPersistenceStore.

functional_units.name: CoreData Session Persistence Extension
functional_units.description: Adds support for storing bookmark identifiers in CoreData session persistence without breaking existing data formats.

functional_units.name: Bookmark Persistence Store Tests
functional_units.description: Unit tests exercising the new bookmark persistence schema and resolution tracking.
